Our Toy Ponies are a stable full of educational fun. Based on real LeMieux team members’ horses, each character has a soft coat and plaitable mane and tail, perfect for grooming and hours of endless play. Real mini tack and accessories teach your little equestrian to tack up, bandage and groom. Little equestrians can learn about pony care with LeMieux’s Toy Ponies, each inspired by a real LeMieux team member’s horse. Hand-finished with high-quality details and miniature tack and accessories, it’s the perfect way to introduce children to the equestrian world through imaginative play. “This was the perfect gift for a horse-loving child’s birthday present. My daughter loves how she can tack up. The ponies seem to be made of high-quality materials and are very soft. The little carrier box makes it easy to pack them anywhere we go.” LeMieux Customer Each LeMieux Toy Pony comes packaged in its own reversible horse box/stable carry case. A wide range of LeMieux Toy Pony tack and accessories are available, from saddles and bridles to rosettes, grooming kits, replica rugs, boots and bandages. The ideal way to begin their equestrian education.
